hasDitaContent.@value: Typhoid vaccine, oral is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with vincristine. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Typhoid vaccine, oral   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   vincristine .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both vincristine and valganciclovir can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  vincristine  and  valganciclovir  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both vincristine and valproate can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  vincristine  and  valproate  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both vincristine and vancomycin can increase the risk of ototoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  vincristine  and  vancomycin  can increase the risk of ototoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Varicella-zoster vaccine is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with vincristine. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Varicella-zoster vaccine   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   vincristine .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Verapamil is predicted to increase the exposure to vincristine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vincristine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both vincristine and vismodegib can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  vincristine  and  vismodegib  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to vincristine. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   vincristine .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Yellow fever vaccine, live is predicted to increase the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with vincristine. Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Yellow fever vaccine, live   is predicted to   increase   the risk of generalised infection (possibly life-threatening) when given with   vincristine .  Public Health England advises avoid (refer to Green Book) .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both vincristine and zidovudine can increase the risk of myelosuppression.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  vincristine  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of myelosuppression.
